mapper.select: SELECT l.id, s.name AS shipName, l.area, l.constellation, l.galaxy, l.num, l.loss_time AS lossTime, l.km_ship AS kmShip, l.high_atk_ship AS highAtkShip, l.price, l.img, l.is_modify AS isModify FROM loss l LEFT JOIN ship s ON s.id = l.ship_id WHERE l.state = 'A' AND l.payment_id = #{paymentId} AND l.army_id = #{armyId}
SELECT l.army_id AS armyId, a.`name` AS armyName, a.short_name AS armyShortName, l.num FROM loss l LEFT JOIN army a ON a.id = l.army_id WHERE l.state = 'A' AND l.payment_id = #{pid}
SELECT l.ship_id AS shipId, s.`name` AS shipName, s.type AS shipType, l.num FROM loss l LEFT JOIN ship s ON s.id = l.ship_id WHERE l.state = 'A' AND l.payment_id = #{pid}
mapper.update: UPDATE loss SET payment_id = #{paymentId}, army_id = #{armyId}, ship_id = #{shipId}, loss_time = #{lossTime}, area = #{area}, constellation = #{constellation}, galaxy = #{galaxy}, num = #{num}, km_ship = #{kmShip}, high_atk_ship = #{highAtkShip}, img = #{img}, is_modify = #{isModify}, state = #{state} WHERE id = #{id}
